title: Ep 19: Old Friends with Allyson Livingstone
itunes:title: Ep 19: Old Friends with Allyson Livingstone

description:
Kate's getting over a stomach bug and talks about sticking to self-care when you're not feeling your best. Doree details her nail care habits while Kate sets an intention to stop hating her hands.

Then Doree interviews one of her best (and first!) friends, Allyson Livingstone, Brandeis University's Director of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Education, Training, and Development. She and Doree discuss meal-planning, her hair moisturizing routine, and how The Real Housewives is an important part of self-care.

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: serums).

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Thrive Market -- Visit ThriveMarket.com/Forever35 for $60 worth of free organic groceries with free shipping.
  • Care/Of -- For 25% off your first subscription of personalized vitamins, visit Takecareof.com and use promo code Forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
